card.name: Sloth 15
card.description: Create mechanism to process else blocks

acceptance-criteria.criterium: When "else" is on the same level as "if" and expression after "if" is true remove "if" Toe tags and everything between beginning of "else" Toe tag and ending of "endif" Toe tag
When "else" is on the same level as "if" and expression after "if" is false remove "endif" Toe tags and everything between beginning of "if" Toe tag and ending of "else" Toe tag
